title: 08/06/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/06/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Nick Wright fills in for Colin and disputes Charles Barkley's argument against LeBron James being the greatest player of all time. He reacts to breaking news out of the NFL with Bills quarterback Josh Allen getting a huge $258 million contract extension. He also responds to Colin's assertion that Patrick Mahomes is not a Hall of Famer despite his amazing career thus far. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Bucky Brooks joins the show to tell Nick if the Bills overpaid for Josh Allen.
